Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. I was searching for a way to hide/delete animated portraits of kerbals in right bottom corner, cause they hit my fps, and i find this ".cfg" here on forum.  

@PART[*]:HAS[@INTERNAL[*]]:FINAL
{
    !INTERNAL,* {}
}

Scripts works, fps is rock stable and smooth. But obviously there is some problem. Eva button is dissapired with those portraits. So, is there a way to do eva's without that button? I google a lot and dont find anything. Is there is a chance that someone will make a simle rudimentar mod. Something like: press button x or toolbar button, shows up menu with list of kerbals on whessel, pick one, done. I dont know nothing about Unity. I dont give a clue how to "part, internal, final, internal". If its was Skyrim, I would come up with something )).

Or maybe there is another way to rig off those portraits without losing eva? Without those portraits in dx11 mode i have zero loss fps and -40 - 50% memory usage. With portraits and dx11 i loose 20-30 fps, depends of situation. Opengl cut in half my fps. So this is the only way to play RRS-RO. 

Edited March 5, 2016 by vgamble
You can left click on the crew hatch and Eva that way.

Hello,i'm using this patch,it keeps the portraits but without fancy IVA,it also helps me for the pods that don't have any.But i never tested how much impact has on FPS,because the game runs pretty smooth for me.I also play with force dx11,for memory reasons. 

@PART[*]:HAS[#CrewCapacity[>0]]:Final
{
    %INTERNAL
    {
        %name = Placeholder
    }
}
